betterquesting:10.desc:8:
If you know how Gregtech energy works you can skip this quest without reading it, If you don't understand how it works you might want to read on.

As you Might have guessed, Gregtech energy is quite different if you aren't already familiar with it.
So Ill try to explain it to you, Each Voltage tier has a specific voltage.
§8
ULV=8§7
 LV=32§b
  MV=128§6
   HV=512§5
    EV=2048§1
     IV=8192§d
      LuV=32768§c
       ZPM=131072§3
        UV=524288§4
         UHV=2097152§a
          UEV=8388608§2
           UIV=33554432§e
            UXV=134217728§9
             OpV=536870912§c
              MAX=2147483648§f

Above are all the voltage tiers and there coresponding colurs.

As you can see, the calculation for the next voltage tier is Voltage Tier * 4 = Next Voltage Tier.


The next thing is about energy is cable Amps, I have mentioned them a few times but here I'll go into detail about them.
Amps are very important since the more Amps a cable can carry, the more machines can run together.§l

Long story short If you have a 1x cable run to 4 machines and each machine uses 32 eu/t, only 1 machine can run with a single amp, If you have more than one machine you need a bigger cable that can supply more Amps.

One more thing, if you plug a higher voltage cable into a lower voltage cable, the cable will burn up. Pluging a higher voltage cable into a machine however will result in the machine exploding!
§r
Hopfully you understand How energy works in gregtech and won't burn or explode machines :)
